name: My Unfinished Inktober 2020
description:
What is crazier than attempting to do a full Inktober challenge? Trying to do it fully in Figma.


So, having failed to do more than 8 days ðŸ˜… I still thought it would be coll to share these files openly so you can play around with the illustrations, the font and each different style I tried to apply to the images.


Hope these can help people learn how to do some illustration here in Figma, and do not fear to reach out if you want to talk about it. ðŸ˜‰


Also, if you ever want to help me, you can always buy me a coffee, or a slice pizza. Whatever makes sense!
